pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kernel_lasso Expansion // Provides the function to calculate the kernel-lasso expansion, Z-score, and max-min-scale standardization.It can increase the dimension of existed dataset and remove abundant features by lasso. Z Dai, L Jiayi, T Gong, C Wang (2021) doi:10.1088/1742-6596/1955/1/012047.
